verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָק֤וּם <S%H6965><s%> If there arise בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <S%H7130><s%> among נָבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> you a prophet א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חֹלֵ֣ם <S%H2492><s%> or a dreamer חֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> of dreams וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and giveth אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> about א֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> thee a sign א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מוֹפֵֽת׃ <S%H4159><s%> or a wonder

וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> come to pass הָאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> And the sign וְהַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <S%H4159><s%> or the wonder אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> whereof he spake אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto thee saying נֵֽלְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> go אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֧ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֛ים <S%H312><s%> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתָּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> which thou hast not known וְנָֽעָבְדֵֽם׃ <S%H5647><s%> and let us serve

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> Thou shalt not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> unto the words הַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> of that prophet הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חוֹלֵ֥ם <S%H2492><s%> or that dreamer הַחֲל֖וֹם <S%H2472><s%> of dreams הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מְנַסֶּ֞ה <S%H5254><s%> proveth יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לָדַ֗עַת <S%H3045><s%> you to know הֲיִשְׁכֶ֤ם <S%H3426><s%> whether ye אֹֽהֲבִים֙ <S%H157><s%> love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all your soul

אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> after יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> your God תֵּלֵ֖כוּ <S%H1980><s%> along וְאֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> תִירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> and fear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹתָ֤יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments תִּשְׁמֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> him and keep וּבְקֹל֣וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice תִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> and obey וְאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַעֲבֹ֖דוּ <S%H5647><s%> and ye shall serve וּב֥וֹ תִדְבָּקֽוּן׃ <S%H1692><s%> him and cleave

וְהַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> And that prophet הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חֹלֵם֩ <S%H2492><s%> or that dreamer הַחֲל֨וֹם <S%H2472><s%> of dreams הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יוּמָ֗ת <S%H4191><s%> shall be put to death כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because דִבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> because he hath spoken סָ֠רָה <S%H5627><s%> to turn עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> [you] away from the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H430><s%> your God הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> which brought you out אֶתְכֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהַפֹּֽדְךָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> of bondage לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <S%H5080><s%> to thrust מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee out of the way אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בָּ֑הּ וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from the midst

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If יְסִֽיתְךָ֡ <S%H5496><s%> entice אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> If thy brother בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִ֠מֶּךָ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בִנְךָ֨ <S%H1121><s%> or thy son אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בִתְּךָ֜ <S%H1323><s%> or thy daughter א֣וֹ ׀ <S%H176><s%> or אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> or the wife חֵיקֶ֗ךָ <S%H2436><s%> of thy bosom א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> or רֵֽעֲךָ֛ <S%H7453><s%> or thy friend אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who כְּנַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> which [is] as thine own soul בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> thee secretly לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying נֵֽלְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> go וְנַֽעַבְדָה֙ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> which thou hast not known אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thou nor thy fathers

מֵאֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> [Namely] of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> which [are] round about הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> you nigh אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הָרְחֹקִ֣ים <S%H7350><s%> unto thee or far off מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> at מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> from thee from the [one] end הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> even unto the [other] end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹאבֶ֣ה <S%H14><s%> Thou shalt not consent ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> unto him nor hearken אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָח֤וֹס <S%H2347><s%> pity עֵֽינְךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> unto him neither shall thine eye עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַחְמֹ֥ל <S%H2550><s%> him neither shalt thou spare וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְכַסֶּ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> neither shalt thou conceal עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הָרֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> But thou shalt surely תַּֽהַרְגֶ֔נּוּ <S%H2026><s%> kill יָֽדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> him thine hand תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בּ֥וֹ בָרִֽאשׁוֹנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> shall be first לַהֲמִית֑וֹ <S%H4191><s%> upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> and afterwards

וּסְקַלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H5619><s%> And thou shalt stone בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> him with stones וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because בִקֵּ֗שׁ <S%H1245><s%> because he hath sought לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <S%H5080><s%> to thrust thee away מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> which brought thee out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear וְיִֽרָא֑וּן <S%H3372><s%> and fear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and will never יוֹסִ֣פוּ <S%H3254><s%> no more לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and shall do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> any הָרָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> such wickedness הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> as this is among ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> If thou shalt hear בְּאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> [say] in one עָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H5892><s%> of thy cities אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לְךָ֛ לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> thee to dwell שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> there saying

יָצְא֞וּ <S%H3318><s%> are gone out אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children בְלִיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H1100><s%> of Belial מִקִּרְבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H7130><s%> from among וַיַּדִּ֛יחוּ <S%H5080><s%> you and have withdrawn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants עִירָ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> of their city לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying נֵלְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> go וְנַעַבְדָ֛ה <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> which ye have not known

וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֧ <S%H1875><s%> Then shalt thou enquire וְחָקַרְתָּ֧ <S%H2713><s%> and make search וְשָׁאַלְתָּ֖ <S%H7592><s%> and ask הֵיטֵ֑ב <S%H3190><s%> diligently וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> If אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> and behold [if it be] truth נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> certain הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> [and] the thing נֶעֶשְׂתָ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> is wrought הַתּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> abomination הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> [that] such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> among

הַכֵּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> Thou shalt surely תַכֶּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹֽשְׁבֵ֛י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> of that city [הַהוּא כ] (הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword הַחֲרֵ֨ם <S%H2763><s%> destroying it utterly אֹתָ֧הּ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֛הּ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <S%H929><s%> and all that [is] therein and the cattle לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁלָלָ֗הּ <S%H7998><s%> all the spoil תִּקְבֹּץ֮ <S%H6908><s%> And thou shalt gather אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> of it into the midst רְחֹבָהּ֒ <S%H7339><s%> of the street וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֨ <S%H8313><s%> thereof and shalt burn בָאֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שְׁלָלָהּ֙ <S%H7998><s%> and all the spoil כָּלִ֔יל <S%H3632><s%> thereof every whit לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהָיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall be a תֵּ֣ל <S%H8510><s%> and it shall be an heap עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall never תִבָּנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> it shall not be built again עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nothing יִדְבַּ֧ק <S%H1692><s%> And there shall cleave בְּיָדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> to thine hand מְא֖וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> nought מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הַחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> of the cursed thing לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> order יָשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> may turn יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD מֵחֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> from the fierceness אַפּ֗וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his anger וְנָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> and shew לְךָ֤ רַחֲמִים֙ <S%H7356><s%> thee mercy וְרִֽחַמְךָ֣ <S%H7355><s%> and have compassion וְהִרְבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H7235><s%> upon thee and multiply כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> thee as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> When thou shalt hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to do הַיָּשָׁ֔ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God ס
